channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Why StubHub’s IPO Flop Is a Warning for Any Business That Relies on Google
item.description: As AI chatbots replace traditional search, the era of ‘search-first’ traffic for e-commerce is fading. Investors are noticing.

item.title: Are You Building a Business or Just Feeding Your Ego?
Why RFK Jr. Fired His Own Pick for CDC Director
item.description: Susan Monarez was confirmed as Director of Centers for Disease Control and Prevention less than two months ago. She lasted 29 days.

item.title: Employee Engagement Is Down—a Perk Won’t Fix it

item.title: Don’t hold your breath waiting for a lower mortgage rate or auto loan after the Fed cut, analyst says: ‘Unlikely to make a noticeable difference’
item.description: For prospective homebuyers, the market has already priced in the rate cut, and steep auto loans aren't expected to decline anytime soon, experts say.

item.title: 3 Ways to Authentically Target the Booming Wellness Industry
